attributes.review: When i opened the app it INSTANLY started crashing a was hacking my phone😯 i have to buy a knew phone im currently typing this in a nokia 😨😰😰 horrible app dont download.
attributes.title: Horrible. 🤮🤢

attributes.review: 🙀I was looking through the app store⛄️ and I thought to myself 😌✨ what is the most disgusting app in the app store 😸😹 and just my luck!  I found this app 😹😻 When I downloaded it my phone shut off! 🙀🙀 but instead of turning black an image of a cheeto appeared! 👀👄🥬 Nothing I did took the image off 😡 Then my lamp turned into a cheeto too! 😹🙀 I threw it out my window and saw only cheetos! 😿😡 This app is very uncool -1000000/10 would never download again 😾😡😾
attributes.title: This app made me microwave my lamp 🙀😹😿😾

attributes.review: This app was worthless and not helpful.
attributes.title: Piece of crap

attributes.review: app is just overall bad. would be better if it was a bernie or obama app🤪🥱
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: I ordered some merch and the quality was absolutely horrible. The flag was just threads and was falling apart while the shirt when I ordered a women’s medium felt like I was wearing a small. Plus the app is very poorly organized lacks good descriptions of the products.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: Wish there was a way to leave 0 stars.
attributes.title: Worst app. Do not download. Waste of time.

attributes.review: I genuinely wanted to keep up with all the stuff about trump and even though I don’t like him I cared to see how he was handling the country and this app is always glitching and making my phone freeze I had to restart my phone and it still didn’t work.So don’t even bother coming here there’s no use to it🥱🤢🤮👎🏾
attributes.title: Worst app and waste of time

attributes.review: when I got this app it took WAYYYY to long to download. It took 5 months 😡
attributes.title: Long time to download

attributes.review: When I downloaded load the app I think it invited ghosts into my house. Its fine because their nice but still its kind of weird that happened. I was wondering who I should call to get them to leave. I called ghostbusters but they are busy because this has been happening to many people.  For anyone thinking about downloading the app don’t it’s not worth it. The risks are too high. My friend downloaded it and a demon was let into her house. Also the app takes too long time to load. I think it’s because of this new demon/paranormal update.
attributes.title: Poor quality!! Let a demon into my home!!
